name: Chromatic Aberration (itch) (Jon404)
description:
How do you hack the world? By reducing it into concepts, then colors and frames.

Chromatic Aberration is a game about colors and lights. Players are supposed to use their torch and flashbangs to survive waves of enemy attacks, trying to get as many scores as possible.

Shooting your torchlight against glasses to create different colored lights. When exposed to lights that are same colored as their own, enemies will be destroyed.

There are 7 levels now, each featuring a historical event or an art concept.
